infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ayumi Yoshida  Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Genta Kojima  Ai Haibara  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Kamen Yaiba

Voice Cast:

sections.Trivia:
- As Genta eats his eel stick, the Detective Boys ask him to chase after a bill so he runs after it but mysteriously swallows the remains of eel on his stick with the stick included. It might be a production mistake or perhaps, a proof that Genta can eat anything.
- Cars driving in streets (cars 1 to 3) and in highways (truck) are:
- Pastel green Toyota Prius [XW30] 2012 with license plate 新宿 301, ふ 68-20 (Shinjuku 301, Fu 68-20).
- Burgundy red Nissan Quest [RE52] 2015 with license plate 新宿 330, な 30-86 (Shinjuku 330, Na 30-86).
- Sand white Nissan Cube [Z12] 2014 with license plate 新宿 500, ゆ 57-64 (Shinjuku 500, Yu 57-64).
- White UD (Nissan Diesel) Quon with blue container with license plate 新宿 130, あ 53-61 (Shinjuku 130, A 53-61).
- The counterfeiters' Pastel red 2004 UD (Nissan Diesel) Quon with blue container with license plate 新宿 130, お 26-39 (Shinjuku 130, O 26-39). It also has a second license plate on the back written 新宿 130, お 35-89 (Shinjuku 130, O 35-89).
- The same police cars from Mystery of the Burning Tent and The High School Girl Trio's Secret Café reappear.
